home.headline: Our Mission: Your Success
home.title: ReactMentoring is a platform for React developers to find mentors who can help them with their React-related questions and problems. We are a community of React developers who want to help each other succeed.

session.headline: Available mentoring sessions
session.title: From an one-on-one introduction to React's basics all the way up to a deep dive into state mechanics - we got just the right session foryou!
